Texto: 
see above
neg for hiv
antibiotics following stereotactic drainage.
• ring enhancing lesion right thalamus.
• ring is low signal on t2 images.
• central necrosis.
• restricted diffusion on adc map and dwi images.
thalamic abscess due to streptococcus intermedius
• abscess
• metastatic lesion
• glioma
• tumefactive ms
35 year old previously healthy man presents to er with headache, decline in mental status, and right hemiplegia.

no history of drug abuse.
